comments.body: At first I was scared, because it looks really hard to see all the ramifications of this change. But then I found out that the method is in fact not used at all! So do we still want to keep it?

Yes, it's in fact used by the commit just after it as explained in the commit message: https://github.com/lampepfl/dotty/pull/4613/commits/7aa1ee2a01736e8ffce21ca08ba5041795d8a836, see https://github.com/lampepfl/dotty/pull/4613/files#diff-093136d16584c89857e7cb09ec4f6518R75
